item.title: 03_tinygo_esp
item.description: esp-idf環境構築 python3をインストールしておく 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 pi@pi2b:~ $ mkdir esp-idf pi@pi2b:~ $ cd esp-idf/ pi@pi2b:~/esp-idf $ git clone --recursive https://github.com/espressif/esp-idf.git Cloning into 'esp-idf'... remote: Enumerating objects: 364131, done. remote: Counting objects: 100% (4675/4675), done. ...(略
